amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the U.S. government from making ransom payments to any country.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 114-781 to prohibit the U.S. government from making ransom payments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Pompeo.
